entry.title: WIND WARNING, Breton
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:37 a.m. MDT Wednesday 26 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of showers. High 14. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of showers. High 14. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Wednesday 26 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Showers. Low plus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of rain showers early this evening. Rain showers beginning this evening then changing to 30 percent chance of flurries or rain showers overnight. Risk of a thunderstorm this evening. Wind becoming northwest 40 km/h gusting to 70 except gusting to 90 at times late this evening and overnight. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Wednesday 26 April 2023
